```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(janitor)
library(ggplot2)
library(cowplot)



data <-read_csv("old_widths.csv") %>% clean_names() 
```

```{r}
new_widths <- data %>% 
  mutate(new_width = case_when(
    area <= 5 ~ 25,
    area > 5 & area <= 10 ~ 50,
    area > 10 & area <= 20 ~ 75,
    area > 20 & area <= 30 ~ 100,
    area > 40 & area <= 50 ~ 125,
    area > 50 & area <= 60 ~ 150,
    area > 60 & area <= 70 ~ 200,
    area > 70 & area <= 80 ~ 250,
    area > 80 & area <= 90 ~ 300,
    area > 90 & area <= 100 ~ 350,
    area > 10 ~ 400
    )) 
```

```{r}
write.csv(new_widths,"new_widths.csv", row.names = FALSE)
```
